title: Who is Daniel Penny, the Marine veteran on trial for manslaughter in New York subway?
content: A New York City courtroom is the setting for a high-profile manslaughter trial of Daniel Penny, a former Marine charged in the death of Jordan Neely, a homeless man. Penny restrained Neely in a fatal chokehold during an altercation on a subway train, sparking fierce debate about vigilantism and public safety.
summary: A New York City courtroom is the setting for a high-profile manslaughter trial of Daniel Penny, a former Marine charged in the death of Jordan Neely, a homeless man. Penny restrained Neely in a fatal chokehold during an altercation on a subway train, sparking fierce debate about vigilantism and public safety.

title: US: 2 Florida officers dead, 1 injured after suv hit their motocycles
content: Tragedy struck western Palm Beach County Thursday morning when an SUV collided with motorcycles ridden by law enforcement officers. Two officers lost their lives, and another sustained critical injuries. The accident, which took place on Southern Boulevard near Lion Country Safari, has caused road closures, prompting authorities to urge drivers to seek alternate routes as investigations continue.
summary: Tragedy struck western Palm Beach County Thursday morning when an SUV collided with motorcycles ridden by law enforcement officers.  Two officers lost their lives, and another sustained critical injuries. The accident, which took place on Southern Boulevard near Lion Country Safari, has caused road closures, prompting authorities to urge drivers to seek alternate routes as investigations continue.

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs raped a man while talking 'dirty' and wearing a 'disturbing smile,' says lawsuit
content: Music mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs is facing fresh allegations of sexual assault, including rape accusations from a man who claims he was drugged and assaulted at a 2022 Miami house party. The lawsuit alleges Combs spoke explicitly and smiled disturbingly during the alleged assault.
summary: Music mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs is facing fresh allegations of sexual assault, including rape accusations from a man who claims he was drugged and assaulted at a 2022 Miami house party. The lawsuit alleges Combs spoke explicitly and smiled disturbingly during the alleged assault.

title: Who is Santino Pietrosanti, creator of Jaguar's 'woke' ad that has sparked major row
content: Jaguar, the British car company, faced criticism for its latest advertisement campaign, "Copy Nothing," which features models instead of cars. Santino Pietrosanti, Jaguar's head of brand, defended the rebranding as a celebration of diversity and originality. While some praised the move, others criticized it as pandering to a "woke" agenda.
summary: Jaguar, the British car company, faced criticism for its latest advertisement campaign, "Copy Nothing," which features models instead of cars. Santino Pietrosanti, Jaguar's head of brand, defended the rebranding as a celebration of diversity and originality. While some praised the move, others criticized it as pandering to a "woke" agenda.

title: Elon Musk denies Time magazine's cover page checklist featuring him: 'I am trying to make life multiplanetary'
content: Elon Musk refuted a Time magazine cover story featuring a "to-do list" attributed to him, clarifying he gave no interviews nor confirmed the listed items. Musk emphasized his main focus remains on making life multiplanetary to extend consciousness's potential lifespan, noting some items on the list align with that goal.
summary: Elon Musk refuted a Time magazine cover story featuring a "to-do list" attributed to him, clarifying he gave no interviews nor confirmed the listed items. Musk emphasized his main focus remains on making life multiplanetary to extend consciousness's potential lifespan, noting some items on the list align with that goal.

title: Chicago bar owners rally against Mayor Johnson over proposed 35% liquor tax hike
content: Chicago bar and restaurant owners are protesting Mayor Brandon Johnson's proposed 35% liquor tax hike, arguing it will cripple businesses already struggling with inflation and the pandemic's aftermath. They warn the increase will burden consumers and benefit suburban competitors while failing to meaningfully address the city's budget deficit.
summary: Chicago bar and restaurant owners are protesting Mayor Brandon Johnson's proposed 35% liquor tax hike, arguing it will cripple businesses already struggling with inflation and the pandemic's aftermath.  They warn the increase will burden consumers and benefit suburban competitors while failing to meaningfully address the city's budget deficit.

title: Donald Trump picks ex congressman Pete Hoekstra as ambassador to Canada
content: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated former Congressman Pete Hoekstra as the United States Ambassador to Canada. Hoekstra, who previously served as US Ambassador to the Netherlands during Trump's first term, expressed honor at the nomination.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated former Congressman Pete Hoekstra as the United States Ambassador to Canada. Hoekstra, who previously served as US Ambassador to the Netherlands during Trump's first term, expressed honor at the nomination.

title: Russia launches ICBM strike against Ukraine as war escalates
content: Russia launched an ICBM from the Astrakhan region, targeting Dnipro in Ukraine. This marks the first use of such a weapon in the ongoing conflict. The attack, which also involved Kh-101 cruise missiles, follows Ukraine's use of Western-supplied long-range missiles against targets within Russia. Moscow had previously warned that such actions would be considered a major escalation.
summary: Russia launched an ICBM from the Astrakhan region, targeting Dnipro in Ukraine. This marks the first use of such a weapon in the ongoing conflict. The attack, which also involved Kh-101 cruise missiles, follows Ukraine's use of Western-supplied long-range missiles against targets within Russia.  Moscow had previously warned that such actions would be considered a major escalation.

'Want asylum before Trump takes power': Migrants set out from Mexico hoping to reach pre-Don US
content: Driven by anxiety over Donald Trump's impending presidency and his stringent immigration policies, a large group of approximately 1,500 migrants have embarked on a grueling journey from Tapachula, Mexico. Their goal is to reach the US border and seek asylum before Trump assumes office in January.
summary: Driven by anxiety over Donald Trump's impending presidency and his stringent immigration policies, a large group of approximately 1,500 migrants have embarked on a grueling journey from Tapachula, Mexico. Their goal is to reach the US border and seek asylum before Trump assumes office in January.

title: US: Former New York doctor sentenced to life imprisonment for sexually abusing patients
content: Darius Paduch, a former New York doctor, was sentenced to life in prison for sexually abusing numerous patients, including minors, over a span of twelve years. Paduch exploited his position at prominent Manhattan and Long Island hospitals, assaulting patients during exams and employing manipulative tactics.
summary: Darius Paduch, a former New York doctor, was sentenced to life in prison for sexually abusing numerous patients, including minors, over a span of twelve years. Paduch exploited his position at prominent Manhattan and Long Island hospitals, assaulting patients during exams and employing manipulative tactics.

title: Florida man arrested for planning to bomb the New York Stock Exchange
content: A Florida man was arrested for allegedly plotting to bomb the New York Stock Exchange. He wanted to detonate a bomb during Thanksgiving week. The FBI found bomb-making materials in his storage unit. He had been researching explosives online since 2017. The man aimed to 'reset' the US government. He believed the US was ready for a revolution.
summary: A Florida man was arrested for allegedly plotting to bomb the New York Stock Exchange.  He wanted to detonate a bomb during Thanksgiving week. The FBI found bomb-making materials in his storage unit. He had been researching explosives online since 2017. The man aimed to 'reset' the US government. He believed the US was ready for a revolution.

Diddy Party: Sean Combs had keys to all the bedrooms, reveals property manager
content: Speaking about this specific party, Jason revealed that Diddy's team requested double-sided locks in bedrooms. The party took place on May 3, 2014 and there was a rampant cocaine use with broken bottles and condom wrappers left all over the property, The Mirror reported. "The bedrooms the following day were disgusting, broken bottles of alcohol, used condoms, blood on the beddings, powder and razor blades by the hundreds, lubricant on the dressers, marble floors," Jason said.
summary: Speaking about this specific party, Jason revealed that Diddy's team requested double-sided locks in bedrooms. The party took place on May 3, 2014 and there was a rampant cocaine use with broken bottles and condom wrappers left all over the property, The Mirror reported. "The bedrooms the following day were disgusting, broken bottles of alcohol, used condoms, blood on the beddings, powder and razor blades by the hundreds, lubricant on the dressers, marble floors," Jason said.

title: Joe Scarborough CONFIRMS Trump concerned over Pete Hegseth; team looking for alternative
content: Pete Hegseth is a military veteran and a former Fox News host who was infamous for his problematic opinions. But his record was otherwise clean. After his nomination, it emerged that he paid off a woman in 2017 who accused him of sexual assault. This is not like the allegation against Matt Haetz but the Trump team was caught off guard here and they believe they were not told everything by Hegseth.
summary: Pete Hegseth is a military veteran and a former Fox News host who was infamous for his problematic opinions. But his record was otherwise clean. After his nomination, it emerged that he paid off a woman in 2017 who accused him of sexual assault. This is not like the allegation against Matt Haetz but the Trump team was caught off guard here and they believe they were not told everything by Hegseth.
